name: py-deeptools

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
deepTools addresses the challenge of handling the large amounts of data
that are now routinely generated from DNA sequencing centers.

dependencies.name: py-deeptoolsintervals
dependencies.description:
A python module creating/accessing GTF-based interval trees with
associated meta-data.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-plotly
dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependencies.name: py-py2bit
dependencies.description: A package for accessing 2bit files using lib2bit.

dependencies.name: py-pybigwig
dependencies.description: A package for accessing bigWig files using libBigWig.

dependencies.name: py-pysam
dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.

dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
